籤詩版本二:
Kgwedi e tjhabile lehodimong mme ntlo e kgutsitse.
Ka kopo, rapella khotso ea kelello, Yunxia Powder, fetola mokhatlo oa liphallelo nakong ena, 'me u ngole buka ka tlung.
詩意:
Ho hexagram ena, maru le moholi li koahetse khoeli.
Tsoela pele ka mekhoa ea khale le haeba lintho li sa tsamaee hantle.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Eena Wenxiu o ile a bolaoa
Nakong ea Jiajing ea Lesika la Ming, He Wenxiu o ne a entsoe ka matona a bolotsana ’me lelapa la hae le ne le le bothateng. He Wenxiu o ile a qosoa ka bohata ke 'mampoli Zhang Tang eaba o koalloa chankaneng. Hamorao o ile a pholosoa 'me ea e-ba' musisi ka mor'a ho feta tlhahlobo. Wenxiu o ile a fumana moo Wang Lanying a leng teng 'me a apara joaloka senohe ho tseba. Qetellong ba babeli ba ile ba kopana hape, 'me Zhang Tang a bolaoa.
聖意: Ha ke sa phutholoha lapeng, ke rapella ts'ireletso, mathata a lichelete, mathata a khoebo, mathata a lenyalo, khaello ea Liujia, ba tsamaeang ka maoto ba thibang masimo, tšenyo ea silika, tšenyo ea mehlape, batho ba lahlehileng, linyeoe tsa sechaba, ho falla, thepa e lahlehileng, bokuli, lebitla la thaba ea Yan'an lokisoe
古人: Eena Wenxiu o ile a bolaoa
第X籤: Lotho mashome a mararo le metso e robeli
